card.name: Infinite Game
card.text: Sacrifice Infinite Game. Shuffle your graveyard back into your library.

card.text: Interchangeable (Whenever another permanent you control with converted mana cost equal to or less than this card would be put in the graveyard, you may sacrifice this card instead.)

card.name: Mining Rig
card.text: Echo 2 (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.) If your life total is divisible by three, put a colorless Bitcoin artifact token onto the battlefield under your control. Any opponent whose life total is divisible by 5 puts a colorless Bitcoin artifact token onto the battlefield under their control.

card.text: 2T: Put a Bitcoin artifact token into play under your control. On your upkeep, if there are 10 or more Bitcoins in play, sacrifice Mt. Gox and destroy all Bitcoins.
